text:
The district administration has taken steps to fill 202 vacant posts of noon-meal organisers in the district through direct recruitment under the scale of pay of Rs.2500-5000 plus grade pay of Rs.500 purely based on reservation.

Age limit for general category and SCs was between 21 and 40 and they should have passed SSLC and for Scheduled Tribal the age limit is between 18 and 40 and they should have studied up to standard VIII. Applicants should reside within 3 km radius of the noon-meal centre concerned. Applicants should register their applications online from the Computer Centre at the Collectorate. Details may be had from www.kanyakumari.tn.nic from Monday, said a release from Collector.
title: Direct recruitment
